ComicInfo.Series: Burn the Orphanage: Born to Lose
ComicInfo.Summary:
Rock is in his biggest pickle yet! Taken captive on an alien world, his only chance is to fight and try to find a way back home! This may be it for our street hero. MEANWHILE: Bear and Lex go out for dinner.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-----------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Sina Grace & Shaun Steven Struble | 1 | | B | Cover B | Tomm Coker & Daniel Freedman | Missing |
